name: CInsight
description: This is an extension that analyses the privacy and cookie information page for the type of information a website collects and tells the summarizes it leveraging Ai. It also have other features such the feature for checking how old a domain name is (to help prevent phishing including Homograph  attack, Typosquatting or URL Spoofing etc), a typo guage (use to see if a website it genuine) and finally a feature that shows daily internet security tips
author: Israel Nwangwu, Solomon Joboson, Favour Ebube
